About me

I was born in Guadalajara, Spain.

Electronic Engineering Student

I study Electronic Engineering at Universidad Polit√©cnica de Madrid. In Spain there are two branches of Electronic Engineering: one focused on Telecommunications with more weight on signal processing and other focused on Industrial applications with more weight on control theory. I study the former.

Secretary IEEE Student Branch Campus Sur

IEEE is the world's largest professional association dedicated to advancing technological innovation and excellence for the benefit of humanity.

I am in charge of the communications and webpage of the student branch, as well as organizing and preparing talks and workshops.
